name: Jungle
overview: A platform game created in 1985 and also published in Compute mit 1985/05. The loincloth wearing jungle man you control can only jump in one direction (right /left}. If the character is standing on a platform, move it to the right or left by pressing the joystick and you can jump by pressing the fire button at the same time. If the character is hanging on a vine, moving the joystick to the right/left is enough to make it jump in the corresponding direction.
